title: Одна ложь на двоих
overview: Varia gives the job her all thinking that family life is not for her. The girl works as an event manager, and her new task is a wedding for an artist's daughter in Ulyanovsk city. She meets her first love Vlad assembling a work team. The man is married to another woman, but he's ready to leave her for Varia. But will they find happiness?
